input:
Hello Mr. Sinyangwe,



Good to hear from you but your check never arrived and thus your request was closed. Please go to the below link if you decide to make a new request.





Thank you for your interest in requesting DeKalb County records. The County is beginning its transition to “GovQA” which is an open records management system for local governments. To submit an Open Records Request, please utilize the link below and create an account.



https://dekalbcountyga.govqa.us/WEBAPP/_rs/(S(actt1v5lhwmydjtkcwt3ymze))/login.aspx






Thank You,



DeKalb County Police Department



Open Records Unit
